content: round 15 - 16 1 single_crochet in each stitch 36 round 17 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease * 6 4 single_crochet 30 round 18 1 single_crochet in each stitch 30 place the safety eyes between round 6 and round 7 place the eyes 6 stitches from the beginning of the 6th round round 19 3 single_crochet decrease * 6 24 start stuffing the body following the shape of the amigurumi round 20 2 single_crochet decrease * 6 18 round 21 1 single_crochet in each stitch 18 round 22 1 single_crochet decrease * 3 2 single_crochet increase * 3 18 round 23 1 single_crochet in each stitch 18 round 24 1 single_crochet decrease * 6 12 round 25 1 single_crochet in each stitch 12 continue stuffing the body as you go round 26 2 single_crochet decrease * 3 9 round 27 1 single_crochet decrease * 3 6 round 28 1 single_crochet decrease * 2 4 f/o 2 fin make two start with a magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring 6 round 2 1 single_crochet in each stitch 6 round 3 increase * 6 12 round 4 - 6 1 single_crochet in each stitch 12 round 7 single_crochet the two edges together 6 f/o leaving a tail for sewing tail make two start with a magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring 6 round 2 1 single_crochet in each stitch 6 round 3 1 single_crochet increase * 3 9 round 4 1 single_crochet in each stitch 9 round 5 single_crochet the two edges together 4 f/o leaving a tail for sewing assembling place the fins immediately below the eyes two rounds away from each eye 3 place the tail so that the base of the triangle reaches the last round of the body - each piece of the tail should cover round 25 - 28 of the body angle each piece so that it follows the diagonal of the body pride whales these aren t all the pride whales you could make of course but it should help you with the different possible combinations gay pride whale round 1 - 4 red round 5 - 8 orange round 9 - 12 yellow round 13 - 16 green round 17 - 20 light blue round 21 - 24 dark blue round 25 - 28 purple the fins should be yellow and the tail purple bi pride whale round 1 - 9 hot pink round 10 - 17 purple round 18 - 28 blue the fins should be purple and the tail blue 4 non-binary pride whale round 1 - 7 yellow round 8 - 14 white round 15 - 21 purple round 22 - 28 black the fins should be white and the tail black trans pride whale round 1 - 5 light blue round 6 - 10 pink round 11 - 17 white round 18 - 22 pink round 23 - 28 light blue the fins should be white and the tail light blue please do not distribute sell
